It has been decided to formulate the following Transfer Policy: - Duration for rotation of officers under transfer policy:- The duration of officers working on a post will be 05 years, provided that officials appointed to job specific posts will not be transferred, unless there are more than one official on such job specific posts. In case there is more than one officer for job specific post, the officers will be rotated, Ii All India transfer liability: The NHAI officials will have an AII-India Transfer liability. Im The concerned Members will be consulted before transferring the officidls: Such transfers upto the level of DGM will be approved by Member (Admn:) and for the posts of GMs and CGMs, transfers will be approved by Chairman: (iv) In case of emergent requirements of the projectlworks, the officer may be retained beyond five years on recommendations of concerned Member with approval of the Competent Authority. 2 The HR/Admn: Division will initiate the process for rotation transfer of officials who have completed five years at same place/_jurisdiction immediately, so that rotation transfers of officials could be finalized on time. 3_ This issues with the approval of the Chairman: (V.K, Sharma) CGM (Coord ) To, AlLofficers and employees ot HQ/ROs[PIUs[CMUs/Site Qifices 7414 Y1 YT NHA
